entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with a few flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
